attributes.action: Stop sick programmes like 'kill it. cook it, eat it' being shown on tv.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am usually a massive fan of bbc three but now they have become evil!! They are showing programmes about people slaughtering animals and i feel its completly evil!!! Its encouraging animal cruelty and should not be allowed.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
